events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection on May 9th, with moderate damage to the vehicle's front bumper.
Claim was categorised under the Auto Accident cluster based on keywords related to vehicle damage and collision event.
Case assigned to claims agent Michael Thompson to handle all follow-up communications and investigations.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of claim and next steps in processing the auto accident report.
Requested the insured to submit the police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
Received all requested documents including police report, multiple images of vehicle damage, and repair shop estimates.
Investigation into the circumstances of the automobile accident initiated, including review of submitted documentation.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the liability lies with the third party in the collision incident.
Proposed settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and additional rental car costs communicated to insured for approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
Claim formally approved following customer's acceptance of terms, allowing for immediate processing of payment.
Funds for vehicle repairs and related expenses disbursed to the insuredâ€™s designated account without delay.
Claim file officially closed after successful payment and confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
